column6: Two more stories of Marvel's favorite web-slinger! First, a chance encounter with the wall-crawler changes the life of a cubicle-dwelling office worker. Then, spend an evening with a criminal who's been caught in Spidey's web.
column8: | writer:Matt Manning | writer:Bill Rosemann | penciller:Karl Moline | penciller:Mike Perkins | penciller (cover):Damion Scott
